mapper.update:
update O_SUB_ORDER
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_ID = #{proId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_CODE = #{proCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_NAME = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_TYPE = #{proType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRO_PRICE = #{proPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DEPOSIT = #{isDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DEPOSIT = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRO_NUM = #{proNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRO_REL_PRICE = #{proRelPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SEND_NUM = #{sendNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
U_USER = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
U_TIME = #{uTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_OUT_NUM = #{sendOutNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RETURNS_NUM = #{returnsNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update O_SUB_ORDER set ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_ID = #{proId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_CODE = #{proCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_NAME = #{proName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_TYPE = #{proType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRO_PRICE = #{proPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_DEPOSIT = #{isDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DEPOSIT = #{deposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=CHAR}, PRO_NUM = #{proNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRO_REL_PRICE = #{proRelPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SEND_NUM = #{sendNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_USER = #{cUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TIME = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, U_USER = #{uUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, U_TIME = #{uTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_OUT_NUM = #{sendOutNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETURNS_NUM = #{returnsNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select: select count(so.pro_num) from o_sub_order so left join o_order o on so.order_id = o.id left join a_agent_businfo ab on o.bus_id = ab.id where ab.bus_num = #{busNum}
